items.name: Smartphone
items.description: A high-quality smartphone with advanced features and powerful performance.

reviews.comment: Great smartphone! Fast delivery and excellent customer service.
Absolutely love this phone! Best purchase I've made.

items.name: Laptop
items.description: A premium laptop with high-performance specifications and a sleek design.

reviews.comment: The laptop works great and handles heavy tasks with ease.
Excellent laptop for gaming and professional work.

items.name: Headphones
items.description: Comfortable headphones with good sound quality and noise cancellation.

reviews.comment: Decent headphones for the price. Could have better bass.
Average headphones. Not the best, but not bad either.
